DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ENERGY
DOC.TEXT: Xerox , Environmental Group , Will Test Hydrogen Vehicles : Within a year , Xerox Corp. ' s El Segundo facility will be using three trucks converted to burn hydrogen fuel instead of gasoline as part of a $ 2.5-million federally aided research project , Xerox and Clean Air Now , a Southern California environmental group , announced . The first-of-its-kind project , in which solar_energy will be used to produce hydrogen fuel , will receive matching funds from the White_House Technology Reinvestment Project , which encourages conversion of military technology to civilian use .
